titles: Anarchie reviving, or, The good old cause on the anvile being a discovery of the present design to retrive the late confusions both of church and state, in several essays for liberty of conscience / by Abraham Philotheus.
author: Wright, Abraham, 1611-1690.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Abraham Philotheus is a pseydonym for Abraham Wright.
keywords: Liberty of conscience --  Early works to 1800.
